description: Styles for an interactive Tic Tac Toe game, defining themes, layout, and animations for UI components.

classes.name: ttt-main-card
classes.description: Main card for the Tic Tac Toe game UI, with styles for background, shadow, and layout.

classes.name: ttt-header
classes.description: Header style for the game's title with specified font size and color.

classes.name: ttt-scoreboard
classes.description: Container style for displaying player scores with flex layout.

classes.name: ttt-scorebox
classes.description: Style for score boxes showing individual player scores.

classes.name: ttt-cell
classes.description: Styles for individual cells of the Tic Tac Toe board that include background gradients and hover effects.

classes.name: ttt-btn
classes.description: Button styles for game controls, including hover and focus effects.

classes.name: ttt-footer
classes.description: Footer styles containing links and summary information.
